div.head: 物傷睛陷
div.div: the eyeball is injured by a foreign object and sinks in

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the eyeball is injured by a foreign object and sinks in

sense.def: Pathological Condition of an injury of an eyes caused from outside by a foreign object with the eyeballs sinking in as the major sign. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry di fu 地膚 quoting Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 112: 目 為物所傷睛陷 , “The eye is injured by a foreign object and the eyeball sinks in”, writes: 物傷睛陷 , “ The eyeball is injured by a foreign object and sinks in ”.
